data.scheme_name: Haryana AatmaNirbhar Textile Policy 2022-25 - Interest Subsidy on Term Loan - Existing
data.benefits: Scheme provides interest subsidy on term loan for MSMEs up to 7% or maximum up to Rs. 50 Lakhs for expansion/ diversification/ modernization projects.
data.eligibility: All existing units which are engaged in textile and any projects undertaking expansion/diversification/modernization during the operative period of the policy are eligible under this scheme.
data.conditions:
1. The units should have availed term loan from Financial Institutions/ Cooperative Banks/ Sarv Haryana Kshetriya Gramin Bank/ Commercial Banks after 19.12.2022.
  2. The unit must have Udyam Registration Certificate (URC) and Haryana Udhyam Memorandum (HUM).
  3. The unit should be in commercial production.
  4. The unit must be in regular production at the time of subsidy disbursement; closed units are ineligible.
  5. Change in Land Use (CLU) or NOC permission for the project must be obtained from the Competent Authority.
  6. The applicant should not be a defaulter or NPA with any bank.
  7. Existing enterprises expanding or diversifying with an investment greater than 25% of their current gross fixed capital investment.
  8. Expansion/diversification must begin during the policy's operative period and be completed within 18 months.
data.beneficiaries: All existing units which are engaged in textile and any projects undertaking expansion/diversification/modernization during the operative period of the policy are eligible under this scheme.
data.prerequisites:
1. The units should have availed term loan from Financial Institutions/ Cooperative Banks/ Sarv Haryana Kshetriya Gramin Bank/ Commercial Banks after 19.12.2022.
  2. The unit must have Udyam Registration Certificate (URC) and Haryana Udhyam Memorandum (HUM).
  3. The unit should be in commercial production.
  4. The unit must be in regular production at the time of subsidy disbursement; closed units are ineligible.
  5. Change in Land Use (CLU) or NOC permission for the project must be obtained from the Competent Authority.
  6. The applicant should not be a defaulter or NPA with any bank.
  7. Existing enterprises expanding or diversifying with an investment greater than 25% of their current gross fixed capital investment.
  8. Expansion/diversification must begin during the policy's operative period and be completed within 18 months.
data.nodal_agency: Directorate of Micro, Small & Medium Enterprises, Haryana
data.context: Through this scheme, the Government will provide financial assistance for creating besting-class manufacturing infrastructure, upgradation of technology, promotion of textile products across value chain particularly technical textiles and manmade fibers, backward integration, increase in exports thereby resulting in overall development of the textile sector in the state.
data.objective: The main objective of the scheme is to attract investments and generate employment in the State’s textile sector across its value chain.
data.description:
Scheme provides interest subsidy based on category for expansion, diversification, or modernization projects, including technical textiles, import substitution, and backward linkages:

  1. 'B' Category: 6% interest subsidy on term loan, maximum up to Rs. 20 lakh per year for 7 years.
  2. 'C' Category: 7% interest subsidy on term loan, maximum up to Rs. 30 lakh per year for 7 years.
  3. 'D' Category: 7% interest subsidy on term loan, maximum up to Rs. 50 lakh per year for 7 yeaRs.
data.how_to_apply:
Submit application in prescribed form (Annexure-I) for interest subsidy within 3 months of the financial year's end or from the scheme notification date to District MSME Centre.
Annexure-I : https://cdnbbsr.s3waas.gov.in/s3f48c04ffab49ff0e5d1176244fdfb65c/uploads/2023/07/2023070661.pdf
data.funding_facilitator: Director General, Directorate of MSME of Haryana
data.funding_mechanism: Subsidy would be given after submission of claim provided it is within three months of the closing of the financial year of which incentive is being claimed or from the date of notification of the scheme, whichever is later.
data.checklist_info_a:
Copy of latest URC and Haryana Udhyam Memorandum (HUM).
Certificate of Incorporation/ Partnership Registration with concerned DIC/ LLP/ Co-operative Society Registration.
Change in Land Use (CLU)/ NOC permission for the project for said land from Competent Authority Board Resolution
Power of Attorney.
Land title documents for at least period of 10 years
Term loan sanction letter from Bank.
Certificate for Bank/ Financial Institution concerned (Annexure – II).
CA Certificate regarding investment in plant & machinery for new unit/expansion/diversification (Annexure – III).
Copy of GST Return/ Audited Balance Sheet for last financial year (if applicable).
Copy of first Sale bill.
Undertaking stating the applicant unit has not defaulted and has not declared NPA with any Bank/Financial Institution.
data.checklist_info_d:
Address: Plot No. C-3, HSVP Complex, Sector 6, Panchkula – 134109
Phone: 0172-2580707
Email ID: info-msme@hry.gov.in
data.beneficiary: Textile Industry - All Entities - Haryana - All MSMEs
data.lifecycle: Required Credit Support for Scale - Up
